allow: Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "SELECT c.id, c.unit_id, c.front_text, c.back_text, u.title as unit_title FROM cards c LEFT JOIN units u ON c.unit_id = u.id WHERE c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY u.order_index, c.order_index LIMIT 20;")
Bash(docker exec scalex-postgres psql -U postgres -d scalex -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_cards FROM cards WHERE deleted_at IS NULL;")
